text:
What makes Bollywood actors the real stars? Well, for starters - a little humility and a sense of gratitude.
Setting a great example for other stars to be thankful to the people behind the camera who make them what they are today, Alia Bhatt has extended a sweet gesture towards her help and driver.
Agencies
If reports are to be believed, just before ringing in her 26th birthday, Alia Bhatt gifted two cheques worth Rs 50 lakhs to her driver Sunil and helper Anmol.
Twitter
Her act of kindness was for a purpose- she wants them to buy their own house in Mumbai. The report further states that they have already booked their houses in Juhu and Khar Danda. Alia wanted to thank them for being there since the beginning of her acting journey.
Agencies
On the professional front, Alia is busy with the promotions of Abhishek Varman's period drama Kalank and will soon take a break and fly off to the US with boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor for a quick holiday.
